dcterms:creator: Ookla
dcterms:description: The Ookla dataset captures mobile internet connectivity measurements worldwide, collected from users conducting speed tests. It includes variables such as geographical coordinates, mean download and upload speeds, the count of tests conducted in each area, and a comprehensive score assessing connection speed.
dcterms:title: Ookla Dataset

dcterms:description: The Georgia dataset consists of mobile connection data collected from users in Georgia, with a total of 28,587 data points. It includes metrics such as connection scores but does not specify the providers of the devices used for testing.
dcterms:title: Georgia Dataset

dcterms:description: The New Mexico dataset consists of mobile connection data collected from users in New Mexico, with a total of 7,579 data points. Similar to the Georgia dataset, it does not specify the providers of the devices used for testing.
dcterms:title: New Mexico Dataset
